review: I wish I had known about Chromecast earlier.  I LOVE it.  Super easy to install, and then watch videos from my laptop.  Easy to cast tv shows from Amazon Prime, Netflix, etc.  My only complaint -- you can't cast photos/videos from your phone.  With your phone, you have to use an app that connects to websites (where the casting button shows).

It does what it's supposed to, playing media content through various android apps and the chrome plugin (which can now mirror a desktop computer screen fully), and if you have a newer version of android (4.4 and beyond, I think), you can also cast your whole screen to the tv with this.
